records.location_details: Dead body found in Evros River. Hellenic Police Officers detected a dead body (male), age between 20-25 years old in Evros Area.
records.context_note: On 08.01.2020 at 13:30 Hellenic Police Officers detected a dead body (male), age between 20-25 years old in Evros Area. No travel document found. Body transferred to Alexandroupolis hospital for autopsy to identify reason of death. The result of autopsy will be available in a follow-up SIR.
records.evidence_quote: Dead body found in Evros River. Dead persons: 1. On 08.01.2020 at 13:30 Hellenic Police Officers of Text Removed - Justification 4, who were patrolling the operational area Text Removed - Justification 4, detected a dead body (male), age betwen 20-25 years old in Evros Area.
